entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, trying to open the Snitch and find the Elder Wand.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist, searching for the Elder Wand and wanting the same thing as Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who does not believe in the idea of the Deathly Hallows.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: A character who is right about Hermione being limited and narrow-minded.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The golden ball that Harry is trying to open, which contains the Elder Wand.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: A powerful wand that Voldemort and Harry are searching for.

entities.name: deathly hallows
entities.description: Three powerful objects that Harry and Hermione are trying to understand and find.

entities.name: resurrection stone
entities.description: One of the Deathly Hallows, which has the power to bring people back from the dead.

relationships.description: Harry and Voldemort are united in wanting the same thing, which is the Elder Wand.
Harry is trying to open the Snitch, which contains the Elder Wand.
Voldemort is searching for the Elder Wand.
